entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
